laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: CD4 T-lymphocyte count remained consistently above 200 cells per cubic millimeter after initiation of antiretroviral therapy.
Fall in the plasma HIV load to less than 400 RNA copies per milliliter after antiretroviral treatment.
Persistent lymphocytosis and abnormal results of imaging despite clinical recovery.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Diffuse leptomeningeal enhancement and extensive asymmetric hyperintensity.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: New abnormalities in other areas compared to previous MRI.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Diffuse theta-range slowing and intermittent delta-range slowing over anterior regions.
Multifocal regions of hyperintense T2-weighted and FLAIR signal abnormalities, less extensive than initial imaging.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement of imaging abnormalities after glucocorticoid treatment.
